txt.en: 'A local farmer, Mushêndu, just came to us, alarmed. His chickens are loose again, and he wants our assistance in getting them back. He lives on the hill outside Urmâkh. Unfortunately jackals prowl those hills, so it is quite dangerous, both for him and the chickens. Would you be able to assist him?'
You have helped Mushêndu recover his lost chickens! Return with the scout to Urmâkh with this report.
There is no twist in this mission.
Your mission is to help a local farmer outside Urmâkh round up his escaped chickens.
'Thank you for helping Mushêndu. I'm glad no harm befell him or his chickens.'
'Your mission is to help Mushêndu recover his missing chickens.'
Complete Mission: Chickens Home to Roost
Your mission is to help a local farmer outside Urmâkh round up his escaped chickens.\n\nSpeak to Udlanu to travel.
